name: Trumpie Town
description:
The year is 2020. Trump and his zombie henchmen have taken over and it is up to you to rebuild and take back what is yours.

Was made for Ludum Dare 34, theme being growth and 2 button controls.

All art and coding was done by me using Aseprite and Game Maker.

Hold left mouse button to move.

Click left mouse button on certain objects to upgrade,build,or plant.

Click right mouse button to attack.

Goal, earn 500 dollars and defeat the boss.

No trumps were harmed in the making of this game.

Follow https://twitter.com/mtgjebby for future projects. Currently working on a cute candy platformer.
